verses.verse: The <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H3789>written<s%> with a <S%H5842>pen<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and with the <S%H6856>point<s%> of a <S%H8068>diamond:<s%> it is <S%H2790>engraved<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablet<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of your <S%H4196>altars;<s%>

while their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%> and their <S%H842>Asherim<s%> by the <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> on the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H1389>hills.<s%>

My <S%H2042>mountain<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H2428>substance<s%> and all your <S%H214>treasures<s%> for a <S%H957>spoil,<s%> and your high <S%H1116>places,<s%> because of <S%H2403>sin,<s%> throughout all your <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

<S%H8058>You,<s%> even of yourself, shall discontinue from your <S%H5159>heritage<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H5647>you;<s%> and I will cause you to serve your <S%H341>enemies<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know: for you have <S%H6919>kindled<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in my <S%H639>anger<s%> which shall <S%H3344%H99999>burn<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H7760>makes<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> his <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5493>departs<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

For he shall be like the <S%H6199>heath<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert,<s%> and shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> when <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> but shall <S%H7931>inhabit<s%> the parched <S%H2788>places<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> a <S%H4420>salt<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> and not <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and whose <S%H4009>trust<s%> Yahweh <S%H3068>is.<s%>

For he shall be as a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H8362>planted<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> who spreads <S%H7971>out<s%> its <S%H8328>roots<s%> by the <S%H3105>river,<s%> and shall not <S%H7200>fear<s%> when <S%H2527>heat<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> but its <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall be <S%H7488>green;<s%> and shall not be <S%H1672>careful<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1226>drought,<s%> neither shall <S%H4185>cease<s%> from <S%H6213>yielding<s%> <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H6121>deceitful<s%> above all <S%H605>things,<s%> and it is exceedingly corrupt: who can know <S%H3045>it?<s%>

<S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H2713>search<s%> the <S%H3820>mind,<s%> I <S%H974>try<s%> the <S%H3820>heart,<s%> even to <S%H5414>give<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

As the <S%H7124>partridge<s%> that <S%H1716>sits<s%> on eggs which she has not <S%H3205>laid,<s%> so is he who <S%H6213>gets<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and not by <S%H4941>right;<s%> in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of his <S%H3117>days<s%> they shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H319>him,<s%> and at his end he shall be a <S%H5036>fool.<s%>
A <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H3678>throne,<s%> set on <S%H4791>high<s%> from the <S%H7223>beginning,<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of our <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H4723>hope<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> all who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> you shall be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%> Those who <S%H3249>depart<s%> from <S%H5493>me<s%> shall be <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H4726>spring<s%> of <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
<S%H7495>Heal<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> O Yahweh, and I shall be <S%H7495>healed;<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3467>me,<s%> and I shall be saved: for you are my <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
<S%H559>Behold,<s%> they tell <S%H1697>me,<s%> Where is the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> let it come <S%H935>now.<s%>

As for <S%H213>me,<s%> I have not hurried from being a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H183>you;<s%> neither have I desired the <S%H605>woeful<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> you <S%H3045>know:<s%> that which came <S%H4161>out<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> was <S%H5227>before<s%> your <S%H6440>face.<s%>
<S%H4288>Don't<s%> be a terror to <S%H4268>me:<s%> you are my refuge in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Let them be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> who <S%H7291>persecute<s%> <S%H954>me,<s%> but let not me be disappointed; let them be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> but <S%H2865>don't<s%> let me be dismayed; <S%H935>bring<s%> on them the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H7665>destroy<s%> them with <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H7670>destruction.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H1980>me:<s%> Go, and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> through which the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> come <S%H935>in,<s%> and by which they go <S%H3318>out,<s%> and in all the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H8085>them,<s%> Hear the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and all <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that enter <S%H935>in<s%> by these <S%H8179>gates:<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H5315>yourselves,<s%> and <S%H5375>bear<s%> no <S%H4853>burden<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> nor <S%H935>bring<s%> it in by the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

neither carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H4853>burden<s%> out of your <S%H1004>houses<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6942>holy,<s%> neither <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H4399>work:<s%> but make the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

But they <S%H241>didn't<s%> listen, neither <S%H5186>turn<s%> their <S%H241>ear,<s%> but made their <S%H6203>neck<s%> <S%H7185>stiff,<s%> that they might not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and might not <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>

It shall <S%H8085>happen,<s%> if you diligently <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H5002>me,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> in no <S%H4853>burden<s%> through the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> but to make the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6942>holy,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> work <S%H4399>therein;<s%>

then shall there <S%H935>enter<s%> in by the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H8269>they,<s%> and their princes, the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

They shall <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and from the places <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and from the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> and from the hill <S%H2022>country,<s%> and from the <S%H5045>South,<s%> <S%H935>bringing<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and meal <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> and <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> and <S%H935>bringing<s%> sacrifices of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

But if you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me to make the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6942>holy,<s%> and not to <S%H5375>bear<s%> a <S%H4853>burden<s%> and enter <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> then will I <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in its <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>
